abilities.name: Face of Death
abilities.rule: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. That enemy unit must take a Battle‐shock test, subtracting 1 from the result.

abilities.name: Harvester of Souls
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, in your Shooting phase, after selecting targets for that unit’s attacks, if every attack targets the same unit, roll one D6 for the target unit and one D6 for every other enemy unit within 3" of the target unit. On a 5+, the unit being rolled for is struck by explosive debris; after resolving all of that unit’s attacks against the target unit, each unit struck by explosive debris suffers D3 mortal wounds.
